alert.note: Alert for Niihau in Kauai (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 21 at 4:26AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM HST THIS MORNING FOR THE ISLAND OF KAUAI IN KAUAI COUNTY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...The island of Kauai in Kauai County. * WHEN...Until 715 AM HST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding on roads, poor drainage areas, and in streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 412 AM HST, radar indicated heavy rain continuing to move in across Barking Sands, Mana to Kilauea. Rain was falling at a rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kapaa, Kekaha, Princeville, Kilauea, North Fork Wailua Trails, Kokee State Park, Wainiha, Hanalei, Na Pali State Park, Haena, Wailua Homesteads, Waimea, Hanapepe, Wailua, Polihale, Moloaa, Mana, Anahola, Barking Sands and Waimea Canyon State Park. This advisory may need to be extended beyond 715 AM HST if flooding persists.
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, drainage ditches and low lying areas prone to flooding. This Flood Advisory replaces the previously issued Flood Advisory that was in effect for portions of the island of Kauai in Kauai County.
